name: @fluentui/svg-sprites
description: Fluent System Icons are a collection of familiar, friendly, and modern icons from Microsoft.

scripts.sprites: mkdir ./sprites && for i in ./icons/*.svg; do svgstore -o "./sprites/$(basename $i .svg).sprite.svg" "$i"; done
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run rename && npm run unfill && npm run optimize && npm run sprites
